dao

Interface FileDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileLocalStorage

    public interface FileDAO
    This class provides the specification of the methods available to load and download files to the system. It is implemented in FileLocalStorage. The files must be checked as valid before being processed by this class.
    Author:
    oscar
